start_message.other:
Welcome to The King Says bot that can assist you in your party plays with your friens.
Just create a session, send invitation link, choose The King and follow his/her instructions.
Press /help to see how to send commands and their syntax.

select_gender.other: Select your gender or pick 'both' if you want to act for both genders, pick 'none' if you don't want to act in gender-specific activities

help_info.other: How to play: - First, create a session and invite your friends using the invitation link - Then choose The King (you can use /number command and choose Player #1 as The King) - After that King can either send the commands directly, or you can suggest commands (anonymously of course) and The King will send random ones from the suggested Syntax. Use any of these as placeholders to randomize players 🎲,❓,❔ - a random player 🚺,🍑,🍩,👒 - a random girl 🚹,🍆,🍌,🎩 - a random boy 💙/❤️ - two random players with opposite genders Example commands that you can try: 👒 kisses 🎲 💙 gives massage to ❤️

no_session_error.other: You're not in a session. Create one or ask for a link to an existent session

command_canceled.other: If there was some action I canceled it

link_session_is_old.other: The link that you've used leads to an old session. Request a new link or create a new session.

send_session_id.other: Send token of the session you want to join

session_is_too_old.other:
This session message is too old.
Use /session command to see the latest session info

session_not_found_try_again.other: A session with such an id is not found. Check the token correctness and try again

name_too_long.other: Name is too long, try to use a shorter one

suggest_command_msg.other:
Type a command that will be suggested to others. Don't forget about placeholders:
🎲,❓,❔ - a random player
🚺,🍑,🍩,👒 - a random girl
🚹,🍆,🍌,🎩 - a random boy
💙/❤️ - two random players with opposite genders

no_suggested_commands.other: No suggested commands in the list
